Please use the "Send Feedback | Report a Problem..." button on the title bar in Visual Studio 2017. That way you can work with the XAML Designer developers to debug the problem. Be sure to:
* Include a screenshot
* Explain what type of project are you working on? (C# or C++?)
* Explain exactly what isn't working
* Any errors in the VS error list
* Optionally attach a copy of your broken project if possible
I failed to mention in the post that Designer no longer finds this local static resource in the page's DataContext property...
